statement_text: The goal of the initiative is to protect the health and safety of livestock workers as seasonal respiratory viruses begin to circulate, Dr. Nirav Shah, principal deputy director of the CDC said Tuesday.

rationale: The segment uses neutral language ('protect the health and safety') without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
